column4: When i try to upgrade to 10.04 I get "The NetworkManager applet could not find some required resources.  It cannot continue." Is there anything i can do to continue the update? Thanks.
in a terminal run "ps aux | grep pulseaudio" if you get results - you're using Pulse
also, re: network manager - reask in #ubuntu+1 (the lucid channel)
sorry the puseaudio thing was suppose to be directed to someone else... sorry
